configuration

Class ConfigurationLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • configuration.ConfigurationLoader

  • public final class ConfigurationLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to load the general configuration into memory. Without the general configuration, the other configuration classes don't know where to look.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Configuration configuration 
      private static java.util.concurrent.locks.ReadWriteLock lock 
      private static org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private ConfigurationLoader() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static void createDefaults(java.io.File folder, java.io.File file)
      Creates the default application settings.
      (package private) static void loadConfiguration()
      The same as loadInitialConfiguration(), except doesn't include the default generation bit.
      (package private) static void loadInitialConfiguration()
      Loads all the general configuration into memory and makes it available for other classes.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • configuration

        public static Configuration configuration

        private static java.util.concurrent.locks.ReadWriteLock lock

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigurationLoader

        private ConfigurationLoader()

    • Method Detail

      • loadInitialConfiguration

        static void loadInitialConfiguration()
        Loads all the general configuration into memory and makes it available for other classes. The result is stored in configuration.

      • createDefaults

        private static void createDefaults(java.io.File folder,
                                   java.io.File file)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Creates the default application settings.
        Parameters:
        folder - The folder in which the default configuration will be created.
        file - The file in which the default configuration will be written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if anything goes wrong during the initial write of configuration settings.

      • loadConfiguration

        static void loadConfiguration()
        The same as loadInitialConfiguration(), except doesn't include the default generation bit. Should be used to refresh settings while program is running. If no configuration files are found, application throws an error and exits.
